other_tests.findings: Right kidney 8.7 cm in length, left kidney 10.5 cm, without evidence of hydronephrosis or polycystic disease.
Low serum aldosterone level under basal conditions that responded poorly to cosyntropin.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Urinary tetrahydroaldosterone was undetectable on two separate occasions when tested off therapy years later.

other_tests.findings: Initial 24-h urine aldosterone-18-glucuronide level was less than 1 mg/1840 mg creatinine with sodium of 368 mmol/L.
